pullrequest.title: Integrate sockets for aws instance status updates

content.raw:
1. yep

1. ya I think the main role of sockets in the portal is just for providing clients status updates. I added the `simulator_launch` and `simulator_terminate` in case it's ever needed.

1. your understanding of all the events are correct. I did some manual testing with real machines and verified the status changes: `LAUNCHING` -> `RUNNING` -> `TERMINATING` -> `TERMINATED`. It should not get to `UNKNOWN` state. The fake_cloud_service could be improved to cover all the state changes but I didn't put too much effort there..
